references.paper_title: Dual encoding for video retrieval by text
references.reason: This paper is foundational for video text retrieval, a key application domain of video text spotting, directly influencing the design of GoMatching.

references.paper_title: Spts v2: single-point scene text spotting
references.reason: This work significantly advances image text spotting, which GoMatching leverages, offering improvements in efficiency and recognition capabilities.

references.paper_title: Deepsolo: Let transformer decoder with explicit points solo for text spotting
references.reason: GoMatching directly uses Deepsolo as its image text spotter; thus, the performance and architecture of Deepsolo are crucial for GoMatching's success.
This paper introduces the DETR framework, a fundamental concept that underlies several video text spotting methods, including the design of GoMatching's tracker.

references.paper_title: Deformable detr: Deformable transformers for end-to-end object detection
references.reason: This work improves upon the DETR framework, which is relevant because several VTS models, including GoMatching, utilize transformer-based architectures for tracking.
